title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, allowing easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, enabling browser and Node.js LLM usage.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models, providing LangChain-compatible wrappers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama, featuring markdown, code highlighting, and model management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama, offering synchronous and asynchronous APIs for Java/Kotlin applications.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API for easy integration into Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI client for Ollama with conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style code-completion helpers via Copilot.vim.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset, letting you use Ollama models in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images for Ollama with GPU (CUDA/ROCm) and CPU-only variants.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and GPU support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Electron desktop GUI for Ollama with system-tray integration.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot template that uses Ollama for local LLM conversations.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline combining Ollama with Chroma/Qdrant vector DBs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any Discord server.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama models as a Slack bot with DM and channel support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI assistance using Ollama models inside your vault.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds Ollama-powered code explanation, generation, and chat sidebar.
